name: Good Throb (Strawberry Custard)
description: One of my ADV's. I always keep 120ml around. This is a very thick and smooth vape that ages very well.
author: Mixepic

reviews.text: This is a fantastic strawberry custard. I let it sit for a week and now I can't put it down. I added 0.5% CAP Super Sweet, but it seems like it doesn't really need it.

I mixed a lot of recipes the past few days / weeks and I lost track what's what. When I picked the bottle with "Good Throb" up, I thought what a delicious strawberry cheesecake. Came back to review and this doesn't contain a single drop of cheesecake. I'm confused :)
